p:
Territory of Washington County of Spokane}ss I hereby certify that I served the within subpoena on the within named witness by reading the same to each of them in said County, on this 24th day of May A.D. 1887. James Glipson Sheriff By by R.N. David Deputy
Case No. SUBPOENA In the District Court of the Territory of Wash- ington, and for the Fourth Judicial District Thereof holding terms at Spokane Falls, Spokane County, in said Territory. Territory Plaintiff Vs. Ray Raymond Defendant Returned and filed this 26th day of May A.D. 1887 D.A. Clement Clerk By Deputy SHERIFF'S FEES Serving 8 names at .40 3.20 Mileage 70 miled at .10 7.00 Total, - - - - - $ 10.20
